entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
